title: White Sands National Monument: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer        Volunteer leading the Sunset Stroll NPS Photo          Become a VIP (Volunteer-in-Parks)! White Sands offers a variety of volunteer opportunities, welcoming people from all over. Positions can range from working in the visitor center to assisting staff in various maintenance or natural resource projects.  Current open volunteer positions are listed below. These links will take you to Volunteer.gov, where you can fill out the online application. Once your application is received, the Volunteer Coordinator will contact you. Wondering what it's like to be a VIP? Read what one volunteer wrote about her experience here at White Sands!       Current Volunteer Opportunities         Park volunteers do a variety of things including maintenance projects like installing park signs. NPS Photo
